Why Lampsiheirs

We make renovation simple, we give your building a world class finish — from sourcing to installation. Choose LAMPSI HEIRS for quality materials, skilled installers, and hassle-free nationwide delivery.

What We Offer

Comprehensive solutions for all your tiling and sanitary ware needs.

Floor & Wall Tiles

Floor & wall tiles, kitchen tiles, marble and porcelain — styles for modern to classic interiors.

Bathroom & Sanitary Wares

Modern designs perfect for contemporary kitchens.

Doors & Interior Solutions

Interior doors, trims, thresholds and finishing accessories.

Installation & Construction

Full tiling and bathroom installation services — from site prep to grout and seal.

Outdoor & Parking Tiles

Durable tiles for external areas and driveways.

Nationwide Delivery

We ship direct to site — Lagos, Abuja, Port Harcourt, Enugu, Ibadan and beyond.
